title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
description: Comprehensive program covering software development, algorithms, data structures, and modern computing technologies. Prepare for a career in tech with hands-on projects and industry partnerships.

title: Master of Business Administration (MBA)
description: Advanced business program focusing on leadership, strategy, and global business practices. Designed for working professionals seeking career advancement.
outcomes: Develop strategic thinking and leadership skills

title: Certificate in Data Science
description: Intensive program covering data analysis, machine learning, and statistical modeling. Perfect for professionals looking to transition into data science roles.
outcomes: Use Python and R for data science

title: Bachelor of Arts in International Relations
description: Explore global politics, diplomacy, and international law. Develop critical thinking skills for careers in government, NGOs, and international organizations.

title: Master of Science in Digital Marketing
description: Advanced program covering digital strategy, social media marketing, analytics, and e-commerce. Stay ahead in the rapidly evolving digital landscape.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in marketing, business, or related field
outcomes: Master social media and content marketing

title: Certificate in Project Management
description: Professional certification program aligned with PMI standards. Learn essential project management skills and methodologies for any industry.
outcomes: Use project management tools and software
